https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bPMwUNwz1xR52C1uJPMcIxQjvhv.jpg Magazine editor Taishin Mamiya interviews high school model Noeru Kisaragi. Despite Noeru's bad attitude, his painting of an ocean intrigues Mamiya and leads to a dinner, during which Noeru solicits Mamiya sexually. Soon Mamiya sees Noeru with another man, and he is shocked to discover at that moment that his interest in Noeru goes beyond article researchâ€”he truly wants to know more about him. Boys Love
